    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Primerjaj, poišči</string>
            <string language="en">Observing and comparing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten und Vergleichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observer et comparer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observar e comparar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservazione e confrontare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση και σύγκριση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación y el comparar</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Naloga spodbuja sposobnost opazovanja. Če želite dodatne naloge, pišite, prosim.</string>
            <string language="en">Matching the top symbols with the bottom ones by careful comparison.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">primerjanje</string>
            <string language="en">comparison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prepoznavanje</string>
            <string language="en">recognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenbringen der oberen Symbole mit den unteren
durch vorsichtigen Vergleich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparier les symboles supérieurs avec les 
inférieurs par comparaison soigneuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combinando os símbolos superiores com inferiores 
pela comparação cuidadosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbinando i simboli superiori con quei inferiori 
tramite il confronto attento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταίριασμα των κορυφαίων συμβόλων τα κατώτατα από την 
προσεκτική σύγκριση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corresponder con los símbolos superiores con los 
inferiores por la comparación cuidadosa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anerkennung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comparaison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">identification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comparação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">observação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riconoscimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">osservazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
